document.discussion_title: Motorway delays due to an accident
document.topic_text: Motorway delays due to an accident 0 Have your say Motorists are experiencing delays this morning because of an accident. There is queuing traffic and one lane closed on the M1 southbound between junction 32, M18 (Thurcroft) and junction 31, A57 (Sheffield), because of an accident. There is also congestion on the M18 to junction 2 A1(M). South Yorkshire Times , 2 min. ago in Yorkshire & Humber Doncaster rail delays due to person being hit by a train 0 Have your say People travelling on a number of Doncaster rail services are currently experiencing significant delays, due to a person being hit by a train. Services are at a stand on First Hull Trains Southbound and on Grand Central between... Doncaster Free Press , 12 August 2016 in Yorkshire & Humber Doncaster rail delays due to person being hit by a train 0 Have your say People travelling on a number of Doncaster rail services are currently experiencing significant delays, due to a person being hit by a train. Services are at a stand on First Hull Trains Southbound and on Grand Central between... South Yorkshire Times , 12 August 2016 in Yorkshire & Humber Queuing traffic on A1(M) at Doncaster due to an accident 0 Have your say Reports have been received of queuing traffic on the A1(M) at Doncaster. The delays are northbound between junction 35 of the M18 and junction J36 A630 Warmsworth Road, because of an accident. Have you got something to share on the... Doncaster Free Press , 12 August 2016 in Yorkshire & Humber Lane closed on the A1(M) due to an accident 0 Have your say One lane is closed and there is slow traffic because of an accident this afternoon. The incident is affecting the A1(M) northbound between junction 36 A630 Warmsworth Road and junction 37, A635 (Marr). Have you got something to share...
